info.title: Sensors
info.description: The Sensors REST API allows you to manage your Sensors Library, create new sensor assets or update existing ones, and download sensor assets as files.

delete.summary: Delete a sensor from the library.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the sensor in the library.

get.summary: Read the sensor with the given id.
get.description: The existing identifiers in the library can be seen in ```SensorLibrary -> GET: /sensors```.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the sensor in the library.

put.summary: Update the sensor given by its id with the information in the body
put.description:
Some properties of the sensor are mutually exclusive, so they should be set to null and only set the desired one.
To get the correct json structure, use the ```GET: /sensoreditor/{id}``` service.
Example: At the highest level of the json, there can be either a camera or a lidar or a radar, so if a camera is updated, lidar and radar should be set to null.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of sensor in the library.

requestBody.description: Json containing all properties of the sensor.

delete.summary: Update the sensor definition by deleting an external file.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of sensor in the library.

delete.summary: Delete all the sensors from the library.

get.summary: List all sensors available in the library.
get.description:
Valid sensors will be displayed under validSensors, with their id, type and name.
If there are any corrupted sensors, they are deleted from the library and their names will appear in corruptedSensorNames, or if the name cannot be retrieved, the flag anyDeleted will be set to true.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of initial sensors to skip.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of sensors to retrieve.

parameters.name: sortByType
parameters.description: Should sensors be sorted by type.

parameters.name: sortByName
parameters.description: Should sensors be sorted by name.

parameters.name: Pattern
parameters.description:
Filters sensors by sensor name, Accepted formats are:
for exact match: ```name```.
for match containing text: ```_name_```.

parameters.name: SensorType
parameters.description: Filters sensors by type: Camera, FisheyeCamera, ThermalCamera, RotatingLidar, FlashingLidar, Radar.

parameters.name: ModelName
parameters.description: Filters sensors by model name.

parameters.name: Manufacturer
parameters.description: Filters sensors by manufacturer.

parameters.name: Version
parameters.description: Filters sensors by version.

parameters.name: Compatibility
parameters.description: Filters sensors by compatibility : Avx, Speos, AvxAndSpeos, None (for Radar only).

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Filters sensors by protection or waveform validation status: Protected, Unprotected, Correct, Violating, Wrong.

post.summary: Create a new sensor with default values for each of its properties.

parameters.name: copyOf
parameters.description: Create a copy of the sensor with the given id. In this case the POST body should contain the desired name.

requestBody.description:
Information needed for sensor creation: type of sensor to create and its name.
Accepted types: Camera, FishEyeCamera, ThermalCamera, RotatingLidar, FlashingLidar, Radar. Example: {"type":"FlashingLidar", "name": "my_lidar"}

get.summary: Download the sensor to a file with the specified name.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of sensor in the library.

parameters.name: packedSensorName
parameters.description: Desired name for the packed sensor file.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of sensor in the library.

parameters.name: externalFileInfo
parameters.description:
Additional information needed for the file download.
Example:
=> for files defined in a radar mode: ``` { "radarInfo": {"id" : "0", "RadarExternalsEnum":"PulseSequence", "radarItemType": "Mode"}, "lidarInfo": null, "cameraInfo": null } ```
=> for files defined in a radar antenna: ``` { "radarInfo": {"id" : "0", "RadarExternalsEnum":"PatternTableFile", "radarItemType": "Rx"}, "lidarInfo": null, "cameraInfo": null } ```
For the files defined in a radar, the possible RadarExternalsEnum values are: ``` TransmitterWeightingSequence, ChirpSequence, PulseSequence, PiecewiseLinearModelSequence, PatternTableFile```
=> for files defined in a lidar: ``` { "radarInfo": null, "lidarInfo": { "LidarExternalsEnum": "FiringSequenceFilePath" }, "cameraInfo": null } ```
For the files defined in a lidar, the possible LidarExternalsEnum values are: ```FiringSequenceFilePath, LidarLensDistortion, IntensityFilePath```
=> for files defined in a camera: ``` { "radarInfo": null, "lidarInfo": null, "cameraInfo": {"CameraExternalsEnum": "CfaTransmissionR"} } ```
For the files defined in a camera, the possible CameraExternalsEnum values are: ```CfaTransmissionR, CfaTransmissionG, CfaTransmissionB, QuantumEfficiency, LensTransmission, CameraLensDistortion, FragmentShader```

get.summary: Download all the sensors in a zip file.

post.summary: Upload multiple packed sensors and add them to the library
post.description: Conflicts might appear if a sensor with the same name already exists in the library.

put.summary: Update the sensor definition by uploading an external file.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of sensor in the library.

put.summary: Protect a section of a sensor with a password.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of sensor in the library.

put.summary: Unprotect a section for a given sensor using its password.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of sensor in the library.

Pre.Sensors.v7.Data.Sensor.Camera.Custom.description: Define the level of output for the camera simulation.

gain.description: Gain to amplify the whole signal (decibel - dB).

Pre.Sensors.v7.Data.Sensor.Camera.Imager.description: Average electronic noise within the imager.

lensTransmission.description: Total transmission of a light ray file(.spectrum).

offsetAngle.description: Angle between the diaphragm and the optical axis of the camera (rad).

edgeNumber.description: F-number or Effective Aperture (F = Focal length / diameter of the aperture area).

focalLength.description: Focal length of the lens system (mm).

wavelengthOfFocalLength.description: Wavelength of focal length of the lens system (mm).

focalShift.description: Maximum amplitude for the focal dispersion. (micro meter)

focalLength.description: Focal length of the lens system (mm).

Pre.Sensors.v7.Data.Sensor.Camera.Sensor.description: Define the level of output for the camera simulation.

bitResolution.description: Number of bits used for the waveform.

Pre.Sensors.v7.Data.Sensor.Lidar.Common..description: Define the level of output for the LiDAR simulation.

peakPower.description: Maximum power emitted by laser pulse (W).

transmissionPower.description: Input power of the transmitting antenna (W).

gain.description: Gain value applied on the model level.

centerVelocity.description: Center value of the velocity range (m/s).

rangeResolution.description: Range resolution of the range doppler map image (m).

velocityResolution.description: Velocity resolution of the range doppler map image (m/s).

samplingRate.description: Sampling frequency of the analog to digital converter (MHz).

centerFrequency.description: Center frequency in the waveform spectrum (GHz).
Center frequency in the waveform spectrum (GHz).

samplingRate.description: Sampling frequency of the analog to digital converter (MHz).

numberOfChirpsInCoherentProcessingInterv.description: Number of Chirps in Coherent Processing Interval.

centerFrequency.description: Center frequency in the waveform spectrum (GHz).

numberOfPulsesInCoherentProcessingInterv.description: Number of Chirps in Coherent Processing Interval.
